text: @realDonaldTrump Don't you mean "a 2 hour Campaign Rally on National TV that my campaign doesn't have to pay for while I lie about the COVID-19 Crisis progress & encourage people to violate all the Safety Rules to protest being paid to stay home so more people will be infected un-infomercial"?
